# Sections In A Reproduction README

_What are possible sections to include in a reproduction or replication README?_

* Setup And Installation
* Data
* Methodology
* Differences
* Results
* Reproducibility
* Limitations
* Future Work
* Acknowledgments
* License
* Contact
* References
* Scope Of Repository
  * Motivation
  * Contribution
* Original Paper
